description: This header file defines functions and interfaces related to Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) entity management, including key generation, certificate creation, and PKCS12 encoding/decoding. It is part of a larger PKI implementation in a C project.

methods.name: AdvPKIEntityImportPKCS12
methods.description: Imports a PKCS12 encoding into the PKI entity object, using provided encoding data and password.

methods.name: AdvPKIEntityExportPKCS12Handle
methods.description: Creates a handle for exporting the PKCS12 encoding, with options for password and CA inclusion.

methods.name: AdvPKIEntityExportPKCS12Encoding
methods.description: Exports the PKCS12 encoding for the entity, returning the encoded data and length.

methods.name: AdvPKIEntityCreateSelfSignedCertEncoding
methods.description: Generates a self-signed certificate encoding, indicating if a key identifier should be included.

methods.name: AdvPKIEntitySetIssuedPKCS7Certs
methods.description: Sets issued PKCS7 certificates for the PKI entity from encoded data.
